result.message: Your test reports are ready. Consult them now or start a new scan.

summary.body: Web accessibility ensures an inclusive experience for all. Accessibility Scanner is an effective tool that identifies issues, suggesting improvements to make websites more accessible, enhancing usability and compliance with standards.
summary.title: Web Accessibility: The Role of Accessibility Scanner
